title: Interaction dynamics of gap flow with vortex-induced vibration in side-by-side cylinder arrangement
citation: Liu, Bin, and Rajeev K. Jaiman. "Interaction dynamics of gap flow with vortex-induced vibration in side-by-side cylinder arrangement." Physics of Fluids . 28.12 (2016).

title: Dynamics and stability of gap-flow interference in a vibrating side-by-side arrangement of two circular cylinders
citation: Liu, B., and R. K. Jaiman. "Dynamics and stability of gap-flow interference in a vibrating side-by-side arrangement of two circular cylinders." Journal of Fluid Mechanics 855 (2018): 804-838.

title: Secondary lock-in of vortex-induced vibration and energy transfer characteristics of a vibrating cylinder subject to cross buoyancy
citation: Liu, Bin, and Hongjun Zhu. "Secondary lock-in of vortex-induced vibration and energy transfer characteristics of a vibrating cylinder subject to cross buoyancy." Physics of Fluids. 33.7 (2021).
